html:
{% set emp = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",doc.employee,['level','grade','epf_uan']) %} {% if emp[2] == '0' %} {% else %} {% endif %}


EMPLOYMENT NOTIFICATION
This is to inform you that, based on our management decision, we have recently changed the name and constitution of our Company from Norden Communication India (NCI) to Norden Research & Innovation Center (OPC) Pvt Ltd (NRIC). Your employment will be changed to NRIC with effects from 01st of July 2022. However, all existing terms & benefits including gratuity of your employment will remain unchanged.

Name of Company

{{doc.company or '-'}}
Emp ID: {{doc.employee}} Bank Name {{doc.bank_name}}
Emp Name: {{doc.employee_name}} Bank A/C No: {{doc.bank_ac_no}}
Reporting Line {{doc.reports_to or '-'}} Department: {{doc.department or '-'}}
Grade: {{ emp[1] }} Designation: {{doc.designation}}
Level: {{emp[0] }} EPF UAN NO: - {{ emp[2] }}

Payments

Amount

Deductions

Amount
Basic {{("%.2f"|format(doc.basic)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }} ESI {{("%.2f"|format(doc.esi)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }}
HRA {{("%.2f"|format(doc.hra)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }} EPF {{("%.2f"|format(doc.epf)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }}
Conveyence {{("%.2f"|format(doc.conveyance)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }} Professional Tax {{("%.2f"|format(doc.professional_tax)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }}
Vehicle & Fuel Allowance {{("%.2f"|format(doc.vehicle_and_fuel_allowance)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }} LWF {{("%.2f"|format(doc.lwf)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }}
Special Allowance {{("%.2f"|format(doc.special_allowance)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }}
Total Earnings Rs. {{("%.2f"|format(doc.total_earnings_rs)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }}
Total Employer Contribution {{("%.2f"|format(doc.total_employer_contribution)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }}
CTC {{("%.2f"|format(doc.ctc)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }} Total Deduction Rs. {{("%.2f"|format(doc.total_deduction)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }}
Net Pay Rs. {{("%.2f"|format(doc.net_pay_rs)).rstrip('0').rstrip('.') }}

If you have any concerns or Queries, you may contact HR Department within 7 days.
name: Employee Salary Structure
